channel.title: CVE Feed for F5 Networks, Inc. -- BIG-IP (APM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F5 Networks, Inc. -- BIG-IP (APM)

item.title: CVE-2019-6591|2024-09-17T04:08:56.646Z -- f5%20networks%2C%20inc. -- big-ip%20%28apm%29
item.description: On BIG-IP APM 14.0.0 to 14.0.0.4, 13.0.0 to 13.1.1.3 and 12.1.0 to 12.1.3.7, a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the resource information page for authenticated users when a full webtop is configured on the BIG-IP APM system.

item.title: CVE-2019-6595|2024-09-17T02:52:11.402Z -- f5%20networks%2C%20inc. -- big-ip%20%28apm%29
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in F5 BIG-IP Access Policy Manager (APM) 11.5.x and 11.6.x Admin Web UI.

item.title: CVE-2018-15316|2024-09-17T03:59:34.793Z -- f5%20networks%2C%20inc. -- big-ip%20%28apm%29
item.description: In F5 BIG-IP APM 13.0.0-13.1.1.1, APM Client 7.1.5-7.1.6, and/or Edge Client 7101-7160, the BIG-IP APM Edge Client component loads the policy library with user permission and bypassing the endpoint checks.
